parameters.parameter4: Interactive Mode [ 0 (Completely Silent) | 1 (Silent Discovery, Interactive Patching) | 2 (Full Interactive) (default) ]
parameters.parameter5: A space-separated list of Installomator labels to ignore (i.e., "microsoft* googlechrome* jamfconnect zoom* 1password* firefox* swiftdialog")
parameters.parameter6: A space-separated list of required Installomator labels (i.e., "firefoxpkg_intl")
parameters.parameter7: A space-separated list of optional Installomator labels (i.e., "renew") ** Does not support wildcards **
parameters.parameter8: A space-separated list of options to override default Installomator options (i.e., BLOCKING_PROCESS_ACTION=prompt_user NOTIFY=silent LOGO=appstore)
parameters.parameter9: Number of times a user is allowed to defer before being forced to install updates. A value of "Disabled" will not display the deferral prompt. [ `integer` | Disabled (default) ]
